sentences.en: ‘Is the fire safe?’ ‘Yeah, she's apples.’.
sentences.cn: “这炉火安全吗？”“没问题，别担心。”。

sentences.en: a garden with three apple trees
sentences.cn: 有3 棵苹果树的花园

sentences.en: an apple tree
sentences.cn: 苹果树

sentences.en: apple pie
sentences.cn: 苹果馅饼

sentences.en: Daniel leaned back on the sofa, still chewing on his apple.
sentences.cn: 丹尼尔倚在沙发上，嘴里还在嚼着苹果。

sentences.en: He decided on roast chicken and vegetables, with apple pie to follow.
sentences.cn: 他决定点烤鸡配蔬菜，然后再要一份苹果派。

sentences.en: he hasn't made it up those apples and pears in ten years.
sentences.cn: 他有十年没上那些楼梯了。

sentences.en: He started eating an apple.
sentences.cn: 他开始吃苹果。

sentences.en: He took another bite of apple.
sentences.cn: 他又咬了一口苹果。

sentences.en: Her grandson is the apple of her eye.
sentences.cn: 孙子是她的掌上明珠

sentences.en: My gran's given us some apple jam.
sentences.cn: 我奶奶送给我们一些苹果酱。

sentences.en: Penny's only son was the apple of her eye.
sentences.cn: 彭妮的独子是她的心肝宝贝。

sentences.en: Poach the pears in apple juice for perhaps ten minutes at most.
sentences.cn: 把梨放入苹果汁中，最多煮10分钟左右。

sentences.en: Richard crunched into the apple.
sentences.cn: 理查德咬了一口苹果。

sentences.en: roast pork and apple sauce (=  a thick sauce made from cooked apples  )
sentences.cn: 烤猪肉配苹果酱汁

sentences.en: Stew the apple and blackberries to make a thick pulp.
sentences.cn: 将苹果和黑莓炖成稠浆。

sentences.en: Sweeten dishes sparingly with honey, or con-centrated apple or pear juice.
sentences.cn: 加一点蜂蜜或浓缩苹果汁或梨汁，让菜带点甜味。

sentences.en: The main attractions of the Big Apple are well documented.
sentences.cn: 对纽约的主要旅游胜地有详细的记载。

sentences.en: The patient can have apples, apple juice, apple sauce, and so forth.
sentences.cn: 病人可以食用苹果、苹果汁、苹果酱等。

sentences.en: They found everything in apple-pie order.
sentences.cn: 他们发现一切都整整齐齐。

sentences.en: What will be the effect of the alliance between IBM and Apple?
sentences.cn: 若IBM公司和苹果公司联手将会有什么效果呢？

phrases.tran_cn: 苹果电脑；苹果电脑公司
不和的金苹果；引起不和的争端；不和的种子；祸根（据希腊神话三女神因争金苹果而导致特洛伊战争）
金玉其外，败絮其中；徒具其表而无其实之物
瞳子；极珍爱之人；极珍爱之物
(澳，非正式)一切都好，不必担心

phrases.phrase: the apple never falls far from the tree

phrases.tran_cn: 热爱的人，至爱；引以自豪的人；掌上明珠；得意门生

trans.tran_en: a hard round fruit that has red, light green, or yellow skin and is white inside
a hard round fruit that has red, light green, or yellow skin and is white inside
